author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two persons were killed in separate road accidents reported in the city on Tuesday night.

The police said that an engineering college student, K. Viswanathan (20) was riding pillion on a motorbike rode by his father, Kavikunjaram, secretary of a cooperative society in Kodimangalam.

While riding on the TPK Road, a bus of another engineering college in Virudhunagar, hit the two-wheeler killing the student on the spot.

In the other accident, M. Saravanan (45), an employee of a textile showroom, was killed when he had a fall from a TNSTC bus at Naganakulam bus stop.
title: Two killed in two accidents
